website_summaries.verdict: Castor oil is known for longer and thicker hair growth, and this conditioner is rich with castor oil that will help your hair be softer and fuller.
pros: Stimulates hair follicles for stronger, longer hair and healthy hair growth
cons: Some said it made their hair feel dry

customer_reviews.title: Will not be purchasing again!
customer_reviews.text: As I read the other reviews, it sounds like each one is about a different product. One says its thin, one says its thick, one says leaves hair soft and shiny, one says leaves hair greasy, etc. Personally this conditioner left my hair sticky and greasy feeling even when I used very little and rinsed very well. My hair is dry and curly and this made it feel gross and look dull and lifeless. It has no smell that I have noticed at all! Are they packaging different product in each bottle or what?? I have also used less expensive products with much better results!
customer_reviews.author: Penni

customer_reviews.title: Very good shampoo and conditoner
customer_reviews.text: This shampoo does moisturize as stated, though for me using both shampoo and conditioner everyday is to softening, so only use conditoner sparingly 1-2 times a week, I have not been using it long enough to notice any growth but am hoping in time I will see it. It has stopped my hair from seemingly falling out as much, all in all am happy with the product and will post again after some time has past.
customer_reviews.author: Tazzy

customer_reviews.title: Far Better Than Average
customer_reviews.text: I have enjoyed this product and its benefits as advertised for well over a year. Altogether a good quality sulfate-free product. However, the rising cost has it running neck-in-neck with more expensive brands available through my stylist. Those products are superior in terms of conditioning. However, if no other product is available the Shiney Leaf line offers one of the best quality conditioners and shampoos available for retail purchase.
customer_reviews.author: DeesBees

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Conditioner
customer_reviews.text: I bought the shampoo and conditioner together and used it for the first time today. I had the color removed from my hair and that is a little harsh. When I was done I washed and conditioned my hair with these heavenly products. My hair feels wonderful. It is so soft and healthy. It's shiny and smells so good. I will be using this for a long long time and I highly recommend you do to!
customer_reviews.author: Toni V. Coleman-Donovan

customer_reviews.title: Great for postpartum hair growth!
customer_reviews.text: Loving this conditioner! Leaves my hair feeling silky smooth and after a month of use I’m noticing lots of new hair growth. After having my son my hair started shedding at an alarming rate and this seems to have helped slow the shedding while promoting new growth. Also love that this doesn’t have much of a scent, just leaves my hair smelling clean instead of perfumey.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING SHINE!
customer_reviews.text: In a word: AMAZING! The smell is fresh and the shine my hair had after just one use is off the charts! My hair has not looked this beautiful since I was a teenager! Looking forward to more amazing results and growth as I am using it in conjunction with the shampoo.
customer_reviews.author: Ravenhair312

customer_reviews.title: A great conditioner, promotes hair growth!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! I have curly, frizzy, thin hair. A strange combination. Recently due to stress I have been loosing hair as well. This conditioner is great because it has biotin in it and that promotes hair growth. Also due to castor oil in the product you need very little when using it. It does not weigh down your hair at all, quite the opposite, it detangles and my hair feels light and clean. I will be ordering this product again and plan on ordering the shampoo as well!
customer_reviews.author: Mindy

customer_reviews.title: It smells nice and tingles in my hair
customer_reviews.text: Actually, I purchased three items. Two bottles of castor oil and a bottle of conditioner. The conditioner feels as if I am doing a hair treatment. It smells nice and tingles in my hair. I just started using the castor oil so I am awaiting results, but I am pleased with the products.
customer_reviews.author: sel thomas

customer_reviews.title: Great Products
customer_reviews.text: I love this combo and I am using it daily for now till my hair gets healthier. I'm a baker at our hospital and it is very hot there. My hair was drying out quite badly and I was trying everything from mayo to coconut oil and just keeping my hair dampened all the time. My hair is down to my waist and had been thinking about cutting it now I WILL NOT have to. This product does not leave my hair oily either. I will always be using this from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hope it works
customer_reviews.text: I saw the ingredient of Castor Oil. I purchased a bottle pure castor oil but find it makes my hairs stick together and need to wash several time days and night. I saw the review and started trying to see to use this condition. So far so good and let to wait to the result later. Currently, the condition is not so sticky and smell good.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki Yue

customer_reviews.title: although I personally like the way argan oil products smell better
customer_reviews.text: Shiny Leaf's castor oil conditioner reminds me of the products used in hair salons. The scent is delightful, although I personally like the way argan oil products smell better. I am trying to grow my hair out, and this product appears to help keep my ends healthy and my hair shiny. I have also noticed reduced frizz as a result of using this product. Overall, I am extremely happy with this purchase and plan on trying more of Shiny Leaf's products.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using the shampoo and conditioner for 1 1/2 years now. I am very pleased with it. It truly is a premium product. I will continue buying this product.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Oops I meant to get the shampoo, but i still tried it :)
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good! I thought I was buying the shampoo but got the conditioner. I want to try the shampoo next but I prefer Silk 18 for my conditioner ..(that’s my favorite) I do like the way this smells & I’m excited to try the shampoo
customer_reviews.author: YourFriendlyNeighboorhoodRDH

customer_reviews.title: Works great and smells great too!
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful conditioner for my long, straight hair. It leaves my hair soft and shiny without a heavy feeling. It smells wonderful too! I use this along with the shampoo.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi

customer_reviews.title: I had tape in extensions for 3-4 months that made my already fine hair, even worse after taking them out
customer_reviews.text: Wow. Where do I start? This shampoo and conditioner saved my hair. I had tape in extensions for 3-4 months that made my already fine hair, even worse after taking them out. My hair felt limp and looked like I had lost a bunch. I was convinced that I had. After only a week of using this shampoo and conditioner, I felt a difference. Now nearly a month later, my hair feels like it used to, maybe even better. This is the best shampoo and conditioner I have ever used. I'm certainly buying more once I'm out! Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: Emily Lopez

customer_reviews.title: excellent product but pricey
customer_reviews.text: Excellent and healthy product for hair. Hair is silky and moisturized. Should be good as a body wash as well. Wish it was more affordable. I have a tight budget.
customer_reviews.author: Casting Stones

customer_reviews.title: Absolute GOLD
customer_reviews.text: Best hair product I have ever used! This stuff is gold in a bottle!. My hair has never felt so healthy and so heavenly soft. I only use it two or three times a week and hair stays sleek and gorgeous between washes for days. In LOVE. Never using any other product again. Forgot to mention it also has helped my stubborn midlength hair to finally grow.
customer_reviews.author: shavana

customer_reviews.title: Love the products but....
customer_reviews.text: I love the shiny leaf products. Only issue is I ordered the conditioner but received the shampoo. No biggie as I love both. Another note, The shampoo bottle was shrink wrapped a bit too tight so there was some leaking inside of the wrap. Just wanted you to be informed. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Alb21077

customer_reviews.title: love this conditioner leaves your hair so soft and without ...
customer_reviews.text: love this conditioner leaves your hair so soft and without any junk left behind like other conditioners do. daughters also feel in love with the way it made their hair feel and now are going to buy this
customer_reviews.author: NIKKOLE

customer_reviews.title: My new go-to conditioner
customer_reviews.text: Great conditioner. Good lather. Makes my hair shiny and adds volume. I like the natural ingredients. Great price compared to other natural shampoos: huge bottle.
customer_reviews.author: gpw

customer_reviews.title: This is one of the best conditioners I've ever used
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best conditioners I've ever used! It makes my hair feel so very soft and it leaves a very good fragrance in your hair!! I do not experience any tangles nor frizzies after using this conditioner and I really love it and will definitely buy it again. My only problem is the size - wish there was a bigger one to the 16oz!!
customer_reviews.author: Guava Jelly

customer_reviews.title: Just bought second bottle
customer_reviews.text: I bought this conditioner last year after I got sick and lost a lot of hair. While I don't think this specifically made my hair grow, I don't think that it hurt the process either. I like how it is free of SLS so it also doesn't make my fine curly hair frizz. Like I said above, I liked it enough to buy a second bottle. I will probably keep using it for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Megan D. Little

customer_reviews.title: Amazing smell and soft feel to tired hair
customer_reviews.text: My hair has been dry and breaking off from overuse of chemical dyes and hard water. I purchased the shampoo and conditioner and my hair took about six weeks too return to being soft and wonderful instead of dry and brittle. This product is thick and really helps out of control hair but you really need to only do ends with it. It can give your hair a slightly greasy look if your not super diligent about washing it all out from sides. The smell is fantastic and I will definately continue purchasing this product.
customer_reviews.author: Alissa N

customer_reviews.title: Conditioner to grow hair
customer_reviews.text: I really love it! i love the smell and my hair feels softer. the only downside for me is the price. but it's worth the money. i am still waiting if my hair will grow more. totally recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Avenido

customer_reviews.title: Not much difference. I felt it made my hair ...
customer_reviews.text: Not much difference. I felt it made my hair thinner too.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Did not make my hair soft... my hair was still rough and hard to manage.
customer_reviews.author: Anony

customer_reviews.title: Conditioner
customer_reviews.text: I love the conditioner. My hair is naturally very dry and frizzy. After using this product a few times, my hair feels silky. Kind of like after you’ve just left the salon.

customer_reviews.title: SEE MY REVIEW ON THE SHAMPOO!
customer_reviews.text: This shampoo and conditioner made a TON of my hair fall out. See my review on the shampoo for the full story.

customer_reviews.title: it also gave me really bad buildup on my scalp
customer_reviews.text: this product made me have really oily hair.. no matter how many times I rinsed it. it also gave me really bad buildup on my scalp. I switched to a standard shampoo, and my hair is much happier. I used the whole set, shampoo & conditioner, for the whole length of the bottle, several months. and it did not make my hair grow better either
customer_reviews.author: Tay Revoniuk

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this product
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product! I been using it for a week now and my hair has a shine and softness to it it’s never had! And it’s finally growing! I been looking for a shampoo and conditioner that does exactly that, I’m definitely sticking with them for the long run! They have amazing results, I’m more than satisfied with this product! And it makes my hair smell like lemons!

customer_reviews.title: Smells great- get compliments all the time on how good I smell LOL
customer_reviews.text: Smells great- get compliments all the time on how good I smell LOL! It is a little on the thick side but it can be thinned so a bottle lasts longer. Makes your hair soft and shiny. So far not sure on extra growth but haven't been using it that long. Would recommend this!

customer_reviews.title: hair feels nice and smooth

I know it's not a miracle to work with couple of uses, will continue to use it and see if hair loss gets any better.

customer_reviews.title: Not good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Noticed nothing special and for spending a lot $20 a bottle I was insanely disappointed. Will not purchase again.

customer_reviews.title: Love this shampoo and conditioner
customer_reviews.text: Love this shampoo and conditioner. It keeps my hair looking healthy, shiny and thicker. People are complimenting me on my hair now. Thanks and keep making this product.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent

customer_reviews.title: Great Smell
customer_reviews.text: The thing I liked the most about this conditioner was the amazing smell! I was hoping that it might help with hair regrowth, and I haven't seen a whole lot of growth since the time I started this conditioner. Nonetheless, it made my hair softer and probably stronger.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing and it works

customer_reviews.title: Made my hair dry

product_meta.title: Cold Pressed Castor Oil Conditioner – Premium Hair Regrowth Conditioner with Cold Pressed Castor Oil, For All Hair Types, Moisturizes Hair, Keeps Hair Silky Soft and Smooth, 16 oz (473ml)
feature_bullets: BEST CASTOR OIL CONDITIONER – The best Cold Pressed Castor Oil from Shiny Leaf is now in our conditioner. Our hair regrowth Conditioner is rich in castor oil’s hair caring ingredients that give your hair added shine and volume.
FOR HAIR REGROWTH – Castor Oil is well known for longer and thicker hair growth. This Conditioner is full of rich ingredients that help with healthy hair regrowth.

EASY TO STYLE HAIR – When you have soft and manageable hair, it follows your every move and you can style it anyway you want. No more struggles with tangles and frizz when you add this fuss-free conditioner in your hair care regimen.
MOISTURE RICH SOLUTION – The conditioner is full of hair moisturizing components that make your hair soft and shiny. The lush formula keeps your hair velvety smooth all day.
BEST SHAMPOO BUDDY – After every shampoo, use Shiny Leaf Castor Oil Conditioner to boost hair’s natural radiance. This creamy and easy to apply conditioner won’t weigh your hair down.
